import PropTypes from '../../components/PropTypes';
import Theme from '../../components/Theme';
import { Inline } from 'fannypack/Inline/Inline';

# Inline

By default it renders a `<Box>` component with `display: inline`.

## Import

```js
import { Inline } from 'fannypack';
```

## Usage

```jsx-live
<Inline>This is an inline</Inline>
```
